overview: Jono from Betawi, Ucok from Batak and Albert from Ambon, are idealistic young policemen. But they are unhappy to be saddled with common routine cases. Then Jono sees the beautiful Anita, but she ignores him. Meanwhile, Albert becomes the subject of media news when he helps a pregnant woman to to give birth on the street. Later, the trio work together in a special team to break a big drug syndicate led by Coki Andrean.
title: The Police
